text: Yehuda Deri is a rabbi, member of the Chief Rabbinical Council of Israel, and the Chief Rabbi of Beersheba since 1997. In 2013, he was a candidate for Chief Rabbi of Israel. He was also a past candidate for Chief Rabbi for Jerusalem and for Tel Aviv. He is a brother of Aryeh Deri. ==See also== * Shlomo Deri ==References== Category:Sephardic Haredi rabbis in Israel Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Rabbis in Beersheba
title: Yehuda Deri
